text: Manish Grover (born 24 June 1951) is a Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) politician and a former Member of the Legislative Assembly, representing Rohtak constituency in the Vidhan Sabha. ==Personal life== Manish Grover was born to Wazir Chand and Seeta Devi Grover on 15 July 1954 in Rohtak. He joined Jan Sangh in 1971. In 1987, he successfully contested the Municipal Corporation Elections from Ghani Pura, Rohtak. He married Veena Grover on 3 February 1982. They have two children Himanshu and Rashmi. Himanshu is married to Somya Khurana and lives in Rohtak. Rashmi is married to Gaurav Ahuja, and lives in Delhi. == Offices held == * General Secretary Mandal Rohtak in 1991 * District General Secretary of Rohtak-Jhajjar in 1994 * President of Mandal Rohtak Vidhan Sabha in 2000 * District President of Rohtak in 2004 * Member of state BJP unit in 2006 * Secretary of state BJP unit in 2008 * Vice President of state BJP unit in 2011 * General Secretary of Haryana BJP (2013–present) ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Hindu activists Category:Indian Hindus Category:People from Rohtak district Category:Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh pracharaks Category:Haryana MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Punjabi people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana
title: Manish Grover
